basics.name: Joseph S. Gutstadt
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Over 3 years of experience crafting scalable data solutions using Python, SQL, AWS, Snowflake, Airflow, Dagster, with strong expertise in data structures and algorithms. Bridged product and technical teams, mentored junior engineers, and led code reviews. Pursuing an MS in Computer Science at Georgia Tech and holding AWS and SnowPro certifications.

work.name: Integra Connect (Egen Solutions)
work.summary: Collaborated with the Product team to guide implementation for DEV and QA teams, reducing deployment delays by 20%. Enhanced sprint velocity by 25% and mentored junior engineers in data engineering best practices.
highlights: Streamlined workflows to accelerate new feature delivery.
Standardized robust unit tests and data orchestration as part of CI/CD workflow.
Mentored 4 junior engineers in Snowflake optimization.

work.name: Epic Systems
work.summary: Resolved critical patient safety issues in a large legacy codebase and developed internal tool improvements.
highlights: Developed SQL-based internal tools saving 30+ hours/month.

projects.name: Job Titles in Data Science
projects.description: Created job listing dataset used by 100k people and wrote a report on data career skills.

projects.name: Cloud Resume Project
projects.description: Developed a cloud-hosted resume including dynamic PDF generation and visitor tracking.
